analyzed: rāhulattheragāthā  ubhayena iva sampannaḥ  rāhulabhaddā iti mama vidū
yat ca amhi puttaḥ buddhassa  yañca dhammesu cakkhumā
translated: “I am Rāhula the Blessed One’s son,🔽and I am endowed in both ways.🔽I have the eye in regard to the Dhamma,

analyzed: yat ca na atthi punabbhavaḥ  arahā dakkhiṇeyyaḥ amhi
translated: I have no more renewed existence,🔽and I am worthy of offerings.
I am a perfected one, a triple-knowledge master,🔽one who sees the Unbinding of existence.
People are blind with lust, covered by a net,
shrouded by the covering of craving.
Bound by the kinsman of heedlessness,
like fish in the mouth of a trap.
I am cool, crossed over, extinguished.”
